Class Executer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewCore.executers.Executer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildBlockExecuter, CardsChoosingExecuter, CardSelectionExecuter, FirstPlayerExecuter, MoveWorkerExecuter, NextTurnExecuter, PlaceWorkerExecuter, PlayerMessageExecuter, QuitExecuter, RemoveBlockExecuter, RemoveWorkerExecuter, RequestDataExecuter, ResumingExecuter, SelectWorkerExecuter, SetNicknameExecuter, SetPlayerNumberExecuter, TurnStatusChangeExecuter, UndoExecuter
public abstract class Executer
extends java.lang.Object
Interface to implement the events to be send to the Controller
